statements: SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date, report_description FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE investigation_status = 'Open';
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, investigator_name FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT reporter_name, investigator_name FROM whistleblower_reports ORDER BY reporter_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE investigation_status = 'Open';
SELECT investigator_name, reporter_name, report_description FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT reporter_name, investigation_status FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WhistleblowerReports;
SELECT report_id, report_description, reported_by, report_date FROM WhistleblowerReports;
SELECT reported_by, report_description FROM WhistleblowerReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT investigation_id, investigator, investigation_status FROM Investigations ORDER BY investigator DESC;
SELECT * FROM WhistleblowerReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_description, report_date FROM WhistleblowerReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM WhistleblowerReports GROUP BY reported_by;
SELECT * FROM WhistleblowerReports JOIN Investigations ON WhistleblowerReports.report_id = Investigations.report_id;
SELECT investigator, investigation_status, report_description FROM Investigations JOIN WhistleblowerReports ON Investigations.report_id = WhistleblowerReports.report_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT report_text, reporter_name FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_status FROM whistleblower_investigations ORDER BY investigator_name DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_date, action_description FROM whistleblower_actions WHERE action_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports JOIN whistleblower_investigations ON whistleblower_reports.report_id = whistleblower_investigations.report_id;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM whistleblower_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, investigator_name, investigation_status FROM whistleblower_investigations WHERE investigation_status = 'Open';
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_date FROM whistleblower_actions WHERE action_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY action_date ASC;

SELECT r.reporter_name, i.investigator_name, a.action_description FROM whistleblower_reports r JOIN whistleblower_investigations i ON r.report_id = i.report_id JOIN whistleblower_actions a ON i.investigation_id = a.investigation_id WHERE i.investigation_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT id, description FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM investigations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, status, findings FROM investigations WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM whistleblower_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT rule_number, description, compliance_date FROM regulations WHERE compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE reporter_name='John Doe';
SELECT report_id, report_date, description FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT investigator_name, start_date, end_date FROM whistleblower_investigations WHERE status='Closed';
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports LIMIT 5;
SELECT investigator_name, start_date, end_date FROM whistleblower_investigations WHERE status='Open';
SELECT department_name, investigator_name FROM departments JOIN investigators ON departments.department_id = investigators.department;
SELECT report_date, description FROM whistleblower_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%privacy%';
